chapters.title: Chapter 7: Playing With Fire
chapters.info: Mangin, p. 142 (119)—Aiel of the Jindo sept of the Taardad Aiel. He was on guard at Rand's door. He and Gaul made a wager that High Lord Torean would not slide as far as the carvings down the hall when Rand threw him out. He did not, so Mangin won.
